attributes.action: call a general election. We represent a vote of "no confidence" in the current government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have no confidence in the current government. This has been caused by over-taxation, the Northern Rock debacle, the 10p tax fiasco & persecution of motorists under a "green" banner.

We believe the current administration has lost the plot. Severa studies suggest the planet is actually cooling & yet we are still being taxed in the name of the environment. People still need to use energy to live, we are not cave folk.

We urge the PM to call a general election & let the country decide.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
